import React,{useContext}from"react";import{Slider}from"@mui/material";import{ValueContext}from"../page";//here lies jason rea, my heart and soul
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Changer=_ref=>{let{handleSliderChange,handleTypeChange}=_ref;const{isBookSelected}=useContext(ValueContext);const classes="w-28 outline-black-500 mx-2 outline-1 text-black outline p-2 rounded-md ";function chooseSliderType(){if(isBookSelected)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{id:"slider",defaultValue:1,step:1,marks:true,min:1,max:24,onChange:(event,val)=>handleSliderChange(event,val)});else return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{id:"slider",defaultValue:1,step:1,min:1,max:109,onChange:(event,val)=>handleSliderChange(event,val)});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col width-full justify-center align-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-row justify-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleTypeChange(true),className:isBookSelected?"".concat(classes," bg-sky-400"):classes,children:"Book"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleTypeChange(false),className:!isBookSelected?"".concat(classes," bg-sky-400"):classes,children:"Chronological"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-9/12 justify-self-center self-center",children:chooseSliderType()})]});};export default Changer;
